item.title: 伦敦 IPO 银行家建议在上市荒期间保持耐心
item.description: 随着伦敦上市活动迎来自 2023 年以来最缓慢的开局，专注于英国股票资本市场的银行家们正期待着一系列改革措施能重振首次公开募股活动。【原文：UK-focused equity capital market bankers are looking to an ongoing series of reforms to reignite initial public offering activity as London listings see their slowest start to the year since 2023.】

item.title: 午夜电子邮件摧毁免费在线报税背后的联邦办公室
item.description: 嗨，我是杰米。国土资源部也在精简人员 取消网络安全保护措施 但首先【原文：Hi, it’s Jamie. DOGE is winnowing ranks and canceling cybersecurity protections too, but first:】

item.title: 特朗普经济衰退是否即将到来？
item.description:
在特朗普经济学中，我们将探讨共和党人的贸易政策及其削弱联邦政府的努力是否会绊倒美国经济。【原文：

On Trumponomics, we look at whether the Republican’s trade policies, and his effort to gut the federal government, will trip up the American economy.

】

item.title: 英国南方水务公司为避免泰晤士河债务危机进行谈判
item.description: 英国南方水务有限公司（Southern Water Ltd.）正在努力解决其财务问题，以维护其投资级地位，保护其资产负债表，避免陷入与泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）同样的债务困境。【原文：Britain’s Southern Water Ltd. is trying to fix its finances in an effort to preserve its investment grade status, safeguard its balance sheet — and avoid the same debt woes as Thames Water.】

item.title: KKR 将把长期所有权扩展至基础设施和不动产领域
item.description: KKR & Co. 正计划扩大其长期所有权部门，将基础设施和不动产投资纳入其中。【原文：KKR & Co. is planning to expand its long-term ownership unit to include investments in infrastructure and real assets.】

item.title: 舒默预测特朗普废除筹码资金的努力将失败
item.description: 参议院民主党领袖查克-舒默（Chuck Schumer）周三预测，唐纳德-特朗普总统废除对半导体工厂补贴的努力将以失败告终。【原文：Senate Democratic Leader Chuck Schumer predicted Wednesday that President Donald Trump’s effort to repeal subsidies for semiconductor factories will fail.】

item.title: 推特联合创始人埃夫-威廉姆斯正在打造另一个社交网络
item.description: 埃夫-威廉姆斯（Ev Williams）职业生涯的大部分时间都专注于让人们通过键盘与世界分享自己的想法。现年 52 岁的威廉姆斯是 Blogger、Twitter 和 Medium 的联合创始人，现在他正朝着另一个方向前进。【原文：Ev Williams has spent most of his professional life focused on letting people share their ideas with the world from behind a keyboard. Now Williams, 52, who co-founded Blogger, Twitter and Medium, is going in a different direction.】

item.title: 谷歌测试新的人工智能模式，以处理更复杂的查询
item.description: Alphabet Inc.旗下的谷歌公司将开始测试一种新的人工智能搜索模式，让人们可以提出多部分的问题；这是谷歌旗舰产品可能发生重大演变的一次预演。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google will begin testing a new artificial intelligence-powered search mode, which lets people ask multipart questions — a preview of how its flagship product might evolve dramatically.】

item.title: 美国指控中国网络公司员工和官员犯有黑客罪
item.description: 法庭记录显示，美国检察官指控一家中国网络安全公司的八名员工和两名政府官员黑客攻击美国目标，包括联邦政府机构、新闻机构、一所大学、宗教团体和纽约立法机构。【原文：US prosecutors charged eight employees of a Chinese cybersecurity firm and two government officials with hacking American targets including federal government agencies, news outlets, a university, religious groups and the New York legislature, court records show.】

item.title: 国债收益率因关税忧虑重回年内低点
item.description: 投资者越来越相信，贸易导致的经济增长放缓将导致美联储今年多次降息，因此美国政府债券收益率重新回到了今年的最低水平。【原文：US government bond yields shifted back toward their lowest levels of the year amid mounting investor conviction that a trade-induced growth slowdown will lead the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates multiple times this year.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税策略正在缓冲主要石油贸易
item.description: 在石油交易商努力应对特朗普政府对美国最大的两个外部原油供应商征收关税之际，其影响正波及整个市场。【原文：As oil traders grapple with the Trump Administration’s tariffs on America’s two largest external crude suppliers, the impact is rippling all the way across the market.】

item.title: 美国股市步调一致表明更多波动正在酝酿之中
item.description: 随着投资者努力应对经济增长的不确定性和唐纳德-特朗普总统贸易政策的潜在影响，美国股市正日益同步波动，这增加了未来进一步动荡的风险。【原文：US stocks are increasingly moving in tandem, raising the risks of further turbulence ahead as investors grapple with uncertainty over economic growth and the potential fallout from President Donald Trump’s trade policies.】

item.title: 俄罗斯工资增长创 16 年新高，求职者争先恐后
item.description: 俄罗斯 2024 年的实际工资增幅是 16 年来最大的，因为该国正在努力解决工人缺乏的问题，甚至寻求从缅甸等所谓的友好国家进口工人。【原文：Russia’s real wages in 2024 increased the most in 16 years as the country grapples with a lack of workers and even seeks to import them from so-called friendly countries, including Myanmar.】

item.title: 欧洲钢铁企业因德国支出和中国减产而大涨
item.description: 在德国承诺放松银根，增加基础设施和国防开支，而中国承诺削减钢铁产量之后，欧洲钢铁制造商延续了大幅上涨的势头。【原文：European steelmakers extended a steep bull run after Germany pledged to loosen its purse strings and boost spending on infrastructure and defense, while China pledged to cut its steel output.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油税收减少表明产量下降
item.description: 俄罗斯 2 月份的石油税收收入同比下降了近四分之一，这表明生产商已经控制了重税项目的产量，以满足该国的欧佩克+配额要求。【原文：Russia’s oil-tax revenue in February slumped by almost a quarter year-on-year, suggesting producers have reined in output at heavily taxed projects to meet the country’s OPEC+ quota.】

item.title: 我们究竟能从与加拿大的贸易战中赢得什么？
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 英国起草 2030 年后石油税计划以取代暴利税
item.description: 英国政府正在为石油和天然气公司起草新的税收制度，以取代 2030 年后备受争议的暴利税，目的是只在价格异常高涨时才对公司进行征税。【原文：The UK government is drafting a new tax regime for oil and gas companies to replace a controversial windfall levy after 2030, with an aim to hit companies only when prices are unusually high.】

item.title: 尽管炼油厂遭到袭击，俄罗斯燃料流量仍飙升至一年来最高水平
item.description: 尽管俄罗斯的炼油业务屡遭无人机袭击，但俄罗斯的石油产品出口依然保持强劲势头，上个月的出口量攀升至一年来的最高水平。【原文：Russian oil products exports remain resilient with volumes climbing last month to the highest in a year, despite repeated drone strikes against the country’s refining operations.】

item.title: 印度央行将注入 215 亿美元现金缓解印度流动性问题
item.description: 印度货币当局将通过购买债券和外汇互换再次注入价值 215 亿美元的现金，以应对 3 月 31 日之前银行系统年终流动性紧张的局面。【原文：India’s monetary authority will pump in another $21.5 billion worth of cash via bond purchases and a forex swap as the banking system braces for financial year-end tightness in liquidity before March 31.】

item.title: 前官员警告：联邦裁员危及国家安全
item.description: 一位前高级情报官员警告说，唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府削减联邦工作人员将使美国国家安全面临风险，因为政府正在制定战略，以应对中国国家支持的持续不断的黑客攻击活动。【原文：A former senior intelligence official warned that cuts the federal workforce by President Donald Trump’s administration would put US national security at risk, as the government works on strategies to counter continuous Chinese state-sponsored hacking campaigns.】

item.title: 英格兰银行行长称工党上调薪资税将提升通胀率
item.description: 英格兰银行表示，工党政府上调工资税将使英国未来一年的物价上涨多达 0.2%。【原文：The Labour government’s payroll tax increase will lift prices in the UK by as much as 0.2% in the year ahead, the Bank of England said.】

item.title: 加拿大官员称，除非美国取消所有征税，否则加拿大不会取消关税
item.description: 据一位加拿大政府高级官员称，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）继续对加拿大征收关税，总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）不会对取消加拿大的全部报复性关税持开放态度。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau is not open to lifting Canada’s full package of retaliatory tariffs if US President Donald Trump leaves any tariffs on Canada in place, according to a senior Canadian government official.】

item.title: 就业增长强劲，美国服务业加速扩张
item.description: 美国服务提供商 2 月份的扩张速度加快，因为需求的恢复有助于推动就业率达到三年多来的新高。【原文：US service providers expanded in February at a faster pace as resilient demand helped drive a measure of employment to a more than three-year high.】

item.title: 丹麦航天股暴涨 481%，交易商寻找国防赢家
item.description: 一家丹麦小公司的股价在不到一个月的时间里飙升了近六倍，因为交易商们正在寻找欧洲军费开支增加的赢家；尽管该公司主要生产用于太空飞行的产品。【原文：Shares of a tiny Danish company have soared almost sixfold in less than a month as traders look for winners from increased European military spending — even though the business makes products largely for space flight.】

item.title: 华尔街银行称市场衰退风险上升
item.description: 随着与关税相关的不确定性和经济疲软指标在华尔街蔓延，金融市场发出了经济衰退风险正在增加的信号。【原文：Financial markets are signaling that the risk of a recession is growing as tariff-related uncertainty and indicators of economic weakness spread fear across Wall Street.】

item.title: 销量回升后苹果升级 MacBook Air 和 Mac Studio
item.description: 苹果公司推出了更新版 MacBook Air 笔记本电脑和 Mac Studio 台式电脑，力图保持公司电脑产品线的销售回升势头。【原文：Apple Inc. rolled out updated MacBook Air laptops and Mac Studio desktops, seeking to maintain a sales resurgence for the company’s computer line.】

item.title: 微软警告中国黑客监视云技术
item.description: 微软公司警告说，一个先进的中国黑客组织正在发动供应链攻击。【原文：Microsoft Corp. warned that an advanced Chinese hacking group is waging a campaign of supply-chain attacks.】

item.title: 阿波罗贷款 1.8 亿美元建造纽约大学最大的学生公寓楼
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is lending $180 million to refinance New York University’s largest student housing property.】

item.title: 路特尼克表示，特朗普将于今日就加拿大和墨西哥的救济问题做出决定
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周三表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统将宣布对本周早些时候对加拿大和墨西哥征收的关税进行修改，可能会对汽车和其他行业实行减免。【原文：President Donald Trump is set to announce changes to the tariffs on Canada and Mexico he slapped on earlier this week, with potential relief for automobiles and other sectors, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said Wednesday.】

item.title: 德国老化的能源网被视为支出计划的赢家
item.description: 德国计划建立一个 5000 亿欧元（约合 5340 亿美元）的基础设施基金，这将使能源网在多年投资不足之后迎来大规模的支出增长，这也是德国为彻底改变公共财政和启动经济所做的更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：Germany’s plan to create a €500 billion ($534 billion) infrastructure fund puts energy grids on track for a massive spending boost after years of underinvestment, part of a broader effort to revolutionize the country’s public finances and jumpstart the economy.】
